en.title: [4Q 2024] Demography
en.description: Quarterly summary of the current population and its structure, including live births and deaths for the latest quarter.
en.description_email: DOSM has just released the latest quarterly demographic data, covering the current population and its structure, as well as live births and deaths in the latest quarter.

bm.title: [ST4 2024] Demografi
bm.description: Ringkasan suku tahunan penduduk semasa dan strukturnya, termasuk kelahiran hidup dan kematian bagi suku tahun terkini.
bm.description_email: DOSM telah menerbitkan data demografi suku tahunan terkini, merangkumi penduduk semasa dan strukturnya, serta kelahiran hidup dan kematian pada suku tahun terkini.
